user.title: Add Handball.net Entity
user.description: Choose whether to add a team or tournament

team.title: Add Handball.net Team
team.description: Please enter the team ID. You can find it in the URL: handball.net/mannschaften/TEAM-ID

tournament.title: Add Handball.net Tournament
tournament.description: Please enter the tournament ID. You can find it in the URL: handball.net/ligen/TOURNAMENT-ID

error.team_not_found: Team was not found. Please check the team ID.
error.tournament_not_found: Tournament was not found. Please check the tournament ID.
